meanings.definition: Herbages: plants used for flavoring or medicine
meanings.sent1: The herbages in the garden are rosemary and mint.
meanings.sent2: She picked some fresh herbages to make tea.
meanings.sent3: The herbages in the soup danced with joy as they added flavor.
meanings.sent4: The herbages in her garden were like a treasure trove of healing.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the herbages filled the room, calming everyone.

meanings.definition: Herbages: the green parts of plants used for food or decoration
meanings.sent1: The herbages on the salad added a pop of color.
meanings.sent2: The herbages in the vase brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The herbages on the plate whispered to each other about their vibrant hues.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a jungle of herbages, bringing life to the space.
meanings.sent5: The herbages in the garden swayed gently in the breeze, a sight to behold.
